CustomField.formula: IF( AND( DATEVALUE( Date_Closed__c )<= DATEVALUE( Customer_Due_Date__c ) , ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Closed') ) , 'Completed On-Time', IF( AND(DATEVALUE(Date_Closed__c )>DATEVALUE( Customer_Due_Date__c ), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Closed')), 'Completed Late', IF( AND( SR_is_Past_Due__c ==1, NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Closed')) ) , 'Late', IF( AND(DATEVALUE(Customer_Due_Date__c)> TODAY(), OR(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'open'),ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Monitor'),ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'In Progress')) ) , 'On Schedule','' )) ) )
CustomField.label: SRD Overall Status
